description: Benchmark for pedestrian curved trajectory dynamics

level_1.description: Broad-scale monotonicity: speed decreases with curvature

level_2.description: Quantitative matching of average velocity-curvature relation
level_2.criteria: Within 15% of v_BC(1 - k*delta) for k in [0, 1.7]

level_3.description: Quantitative matching of velocity-curvature probabilistic relation
level_3.criteria: Velocity distributions match Normal(v_BC(1-k*delta), 0.19) and transversal velocity Normal(0, 0.19)
